quizzes.title: Science Quiz: Movie and Wedding Crashers
quizzes.description: Test your science knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Science, fiction, john. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: One of the earliest movies ever made is A Trip to the Moon  ( 1902 ).  Who wrote and directed this landmark film?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: George Melies

questions.question: Im sorry Dave, Im afraid I cant do that.  This memorable line of dialogue comes from which film?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 2001 - A Space Odyssey

questions.question: What year did the hilarious movie Wedding Crashers first hit the movie theatres in the United States?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 2005

questions.question: In the comedy hit Wedding Crashers, Jeremy was taught how to crash weddings by this friend who passed the wedding crashing torch to Jeremy in 1993.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chazz Reinhold

questions.question: This 1955 Science Fiction film, directed by Joseph M. Newman, concerns aliens arriving on Earth to get some assistance in fighting their war.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: This Island Earth

questions.question: The movie Steel Magnolias was released in 1987.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In the movie Wedding Crashers, Claires boyfriend gets sick after dinner.  What did John put in his drink to make him sick?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: eye drops

questions.question: What is the name of Claires obnoxious boyfriend in the hilarious movie Wedding Crashers?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Zach

questions.question: Which of the following actors did not appear in the 1988 Comedy, Earth Girls Are Easy?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rick Moranis

questions.question: The following dialogue is from the movie Star Trek IV - The Voyage Home.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What did John Beckwith and Jeremy Grey do for a living in the great movie Wedding Crashers?

options.text: they worked together in divorce meditation
they both worked at Blockbuster Video
they did not work, all they did was crash weddings

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: they worked together in divorce meditation

questions.question: War of the Worlds is the 1953 film adaptation of Orson Wells famous radio broadcast based on H. G. Wells popular novel.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What actor played Treasury Secretary William Cleary in the great movie Wedding Crashers?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Christopher Walken

questions.question: In the movie The 40 Year-Old Virgin, Andy has a framed rock poster on the wall. What rock group is depicted on the poster ?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Asia

questions.question: Kathleen Cleary is the wife of Treasury Secretary William Cleary.  What is her nickname in the movie Wedding Crashers?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kitty Kat

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Character and Indiana Jones
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, raiders, ark. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Rachel McAdams (Claire Cleary) actually took a class on sailing when she was told that her character would in fact be sailing in the movie Wedding Crashers.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What is the name of Claires sex crazed sister who is in love with Jeremy in the hilarious movie Wedding Crashers?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gloria

questions.question: How did James Bonds parents die?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Climbing accident

questions.question: Indiana Jones friend, who flies a seaplane in Raiders of the Lost Ark, has a pet snake. Name this character and his pet.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jock and Reggie

questions.question: Name Ursula Andress character’s name in James Bonds Doctor No.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Honey Ryder

questions.question: Who created the James Bond character?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ian Fleming

questions.question: In Raiders of the Lost Ark, Indiana Jones leaves for Nepal to get the Headpiece to the Staff of Ra from Abner Ravenwood. What route does his plane take to get to Nepal?

options.text: Los Angeles, Anchorage, Tokyo, Hong Kong, Nepal
San Francisco, Hawaii, Wake Island, Philippines, Nepal
Chicago, San Diego, Hawaii, Jakarta, Delhi, Nepal

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: San Francisco, Hawaii, Wake Island, Philippines, Nepal

questions.question: By the end of the movie, Raiders of the Lost Ark, which character does not survive?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Belloq

questions.question: After Indiana Jones steals the Ark from the Germans, which two modes of transportation are used to get the Ark to the secret base in the Greek Islands?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Steamer ship and submarine

questions.question: What is James Bonds favourite cigarette brand?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Morland Specials

questions.question: What is the name of the homosexual painting brother of Claire and Gloria in the movie Wedding Crashers?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Todd

questions.question: In Cairo, Indiana Jones is racing against the Nazis to find the Ark first. He enlists his Egyptian friend to help. What is his name?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sallah

questions.question: Who directed the first Bond movie, Doctor No, in 1962?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Terence Young

questions.question: What was the name of the recently deceased family who finally had to realise that they were dead in the movie Beetlejuice?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Maitland

questions.question: Who plays Indiana Jones friend, Markus Brody, who is a museum curator?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Denholm Elliot

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Superman and Clark
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, supermans, superman. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Is it true that according to the Smallville series, Black Kryptonite splits Clark into two separate beings?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: Batman has long been considered a loner and a bit of a rebel amongst superheroes. Despite this, hes had a few sidekicks, and worked in a number of teams. What was the name of the first team he worked in?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Justice Society of America

questions.question: In the first Superman movie Jor-El tells Clark not to get involved in what?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The affairs of humans

questions.question: Who played Clark Kent and Superman in the first Superman movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Christopher Reeve

questions.question: Who played Lex Luthor in Superman: The Movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gene Hackman

questions.question: The original Batman swore an oath to himself never to kill another human-an oath he has attempted to hold true to, ever since.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What is the name of Bruce Waynes mother?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Martha Wayne

questions.question: What is the name of the town that Clark Kent calls home in the Superman movies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Smallville

questions.question: What does DC stand for in the comic which first introduced Batman?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Detective Comics

questions.question: What are the colors of Supermans costume?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: red, blue, yellow

questions.question: What was Batmans original name, when he first appeared in DC comics?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Bat-man

questions.question: Is it true that the role of Superman was Christopher Reeves first movie role?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: No

questions.question: According to the Smallville series, Superman has the strength of how many men?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 10 men

questions.question: How did Christopher Reeve become paralyzed?

options.text: He had a horseback riding accident

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He had a horseback riding accident

questions.question: Who played Jor-El, the biological father of Superman in the 1978 Superman movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Marlon Brando

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Cheech and Smoke
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, field, actor. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In Cheech and Chongs movie Up In Smoke, Cheech meets Chong and calls him Man because he doesnt know his name. What is the name of Chongs character?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Anthony Stoner

questions.question: What is the name of the character played by Stacy Keach in Cheech and Chongs movies Up In Smoke and Nice Dreams?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sgt. Stedenko

questions.question: What happens to Cheechs cousin and Chong in the marijuana field, at the end of Cheech and Chongs Next Movie?

options.text: They crash the Ferrari they stole
They are attacked by wild deer

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They are abducted by aliens

questions.question: In the Earth-Two DC Universe, who does Batman partner with, and eventually marry?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Catwoman, Selina Kyle

questions.question: What is the name of Cheech and Chongs neighbor from whom they steal marijuana in the movie Nice Dreams?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Weird Jimmy

questions.question: Actor Paul Reubens appears in the movies Up In Smoke, Cheech and Chongs Next Movie  and Nice Dreams.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In the movie Up In Smoke, what type of vehicle do Cheech and Chong drive across the Mexican border into America?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A delivery truck

questions.question: In the movie Up In Smoke the characters, played by Cheech and Chong compete in The Rock Fight of the Century in which L. A. bar?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Roxy

questions.question: In the Knightfall storyline, Bruce Wayne finally meets his match in the hulking villain Bane, who fatally injures him, thus causing him to be replaced by Azreal, who becomes the new Batman.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What is the nickname of Cheechs cousin, Duane Mendoza, who parties all night with Chong in Cheech and Chongs Next Movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Red

questions.question: Which of these lists does NOT contain only primary Batman villains?

options.text: Mr. Freeze, The Joker, Clayface, Bane, Scarecrow
Poison Ivy, Bane, The Joker, The Riddler, Ventriloquist
Catwoman, The Joker, Melody, Two-Face, Mr. Freeze
Penguin, Poison Ivy, Mad Hatter, Ras Al Ghul, Clayface

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Catwoman, The Joker, Melody, Two-Face, Mr. Freeze

questions.question: This character from Cheech and Chongs Next Movie has a date with Cheeh and he is dreaming about her, while waiting for her to come in his house.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Donna

questions.question: Bruce Wayne wanted to design a persona that struck terror into the heart of his enemies. In the original storyline, what made him decide to choose a bat?

options.text: He already had a bunch of bat-equipment lying around and decided, What the hay?
He fell into a well as a child, which lead to a cave full of bats.
He was bitten by a bat as a child, which made him fear them, and thus decided it would scare his enemies.
He was in his study, pondering what symbol to use, when a bat flew in through his study window.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He was in his study, pondering what symbol to use, when a bat flew in through his study window.

questions.question: Where do Cheech and Chong sell marijuana in their third movie Nice Dreams?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: From an ice cream truck

questions.question: Batmans sidekick Robin was originally drawn in a rather flamboyant suit of red, green, and yellow. Who was this suit modeled after?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Robin Hood

options.text: Not to talk to the talking bird
Not to stare at his birthmark
Not to touch his bong collection

I am not going to lie. I want money for a beer
I am down on my luck, how bout forking over a buck

All four of them go their separate ways
All four of them are prosecuted for insider trading
All four of them donate their money to a homeless shelter

questions.question: What is the name of Louis Winthorpes fiancée in the movie Trading Places?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Penelope

options.text: Harley Davidson and the Marlboro Man

questions.question: In the movie Trading Places, there was a prostitute named Ophelia. What actress played the part of Ophelia?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jamie Lee Curtis

questions.question: In 1994 we broke out our tissue boxes as we watched Andy Garcia struggle with his wifes (played by Meg Ryan) alcoholism in what film?

options.text: When A Man Loves A Woman

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: When A Man Loves A Woman

questions.question: Where does Cheech work for a short time in Cheech and Chongs Next Movie, released in 1980?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A movie studio

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Leaving Las Vegas

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Movie and Quote

questions.question: Who is Don Corleones bodyguard when he is shot at the fruit stand?

questions.question: Where is Michael when the heads of the families are killed in the film The Godfather?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A baptism

questions.question: Which movie contains this quote: Why anyone would wanna be an orphan is beyond me.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Annie

questions.question: He said, Well, I believe in the soul .....the small of a womans back, the hanging curve ball, high fiber, good scotch, that the novels of Susan Sontag are self-indulgent overrated crap.. . . . .I believe in soft-core pornography, opening your presents Christmas Day rather than Christmas Eve and I believe in long, slow, deep, soft, wet, kisses that last three days. She said,  Oh, my. Kevin Costner played Crash Davis. What actress played Annie Savoy?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Susan Sarandon

questions.question: The following quote is from what 2003 comedy movie: You smell like beef and cheese.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Elf

questions.question: What 1992 comedy film is the following quote from: A gun rack... a gun rack. I dont even own *a* gun, let alone many guns that would necessitate an entire rack. What am I gonna do... with a gun rack??
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Waynes World

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: No one, he just dies

questions.question: He said, What are you saying, that they fake orgasm? Get outta here!  Well, they havent faked it with me. She said,  Ooo...Oh....Oh god.....Oh Oh......Yes Yes Yes Yes Yes...Oh..Oh... Yes. . .Oh god... . .  Yes Yes Yes Yes Yes Yes Yes! . . . .Ooo.....Oh....Huh. This exchange takes place in a deli. Can you name the movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: When Harry Met Sally

options.text: The Man in the Iron Mask

questions.question: Name the thriller this quote is taken from: Candy Cane....... Candy Cane.....

questions.question: The movie is Casablanca . He said, Heres looking at you, kid . What did she say?

options.text: Of all the gin joints, in all the towns, in all the world, he had to be here.
Play it, Sam. Play As Time Goes By.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Play it, Sam. Play As Time Goes By.

questions.question: What are you lookin at, Butthead? was a question asked in what movie?
